messages.title: Only Colin Clark Can Stop IndyRef2 Here
messages.content: A vote for Labour or the LibDems will only let the SNP win here

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Colin Clark is positioned as the only candidate who can stop the second Scottish independence referendum (IndyRef2) in this constituency.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for Labour or the LibDems will only let the SNP win here, suggesting a tactical voting consideration for preventing a win by the SNP.

images.caption: Bar chart showing the Conservative party leading with 40.7%, followed by the SNP with 35.9%, Labour with 11.8%, and the LibDems with 11.6%.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes a bar chart from the result of the 2017 general election in the constituency, emphasizing the close competition between the Conservative party and the SNP.
